name: touchportal_streamraiders
description: Touch Portal and Stream Raiders control

scripts.build-win:win32: pkg --targets node14-win-x64 . && move touchportal_streamraiders.exe base/Win/TPStreamRaiders/ && del Installers\TPStreamRaiders-Win.tpp && cd base\Win && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPStreamRaiders-Win.tpp TPStreamRaiders && del TPStreamRaiders\touchportal_streamraiders.exe
scripts.build-win:linux:darwin: pkg --targets node14-win-x64 . && mv touchportal_streamraiders.exe base/Win/TPStreamRaiders/ && rm -rf Installers/TPStreamRaiders-Win.tpp && cd base/Win && zip -r ../../Installers/TPStreamRaiders-Win.tpp TPStreamRaiders && rm -rf TPStreamRaiders/touchportal_streamraiders.exe

author: Jameson Allen aka Spdermn02
